verbs.description: [ARG1: Trump] - [V: loving] [ARG0: Republicans] Braun , Messer and Rokita fight for the right to face Donnelly in Indiana ; ex - con Blankenship faces Evans and Morrisey for a spot opposite Manchin in West Virginia ; and Cordray and Kucinich duel for the Dem guv bid in Ohio .
